page.title: 08Occupations In Stanhope
page.content: In our area 80% of the people work, one third of them in the Cement Industry. Others work in shops, offices, agriculture, quarrying, mining ,building,the council and steel industry. 20% are unemployed because they can't find a job. Parents have to go to a job centre to see if there is a job for them. When you leave school it is very hard to get a job unless you do a part-time job, like delivering the papers every day. Most people get payed weekly and some people get payed monthly. In stanhope 10% of the people are part-time worker's. Most of part-time worker's are women but some are men. Some people have part-time jobs even though they are still at school.They deliver milk and deliver papers.
